entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 32 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 05 March 2023
